channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN

item.title: Report X-2023100160
item.description:
Report X-2023100160

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: SAINT CLOUD
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was sent up from unload, and then redirected to QA due to being a hub misload, and for being heavily stained at the bottom. Upon investigation the package had a generator, with a nearly full tank of gasoline, on it's side and slightly leaking from crevices unrelated to pumping gasoline. The package is a return. DescribePack: The box completely fell apart due to being too flimsy. It is unknown where exactly the internal leaks are coming from. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: Tipped right-side up, as the packaging has insufficient orientation indicators.

item.title: Report X-2023100125
item.description:
Report X-2023100125

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-30T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: SAINT CLOUD
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found in inbound with a wet spot. upon inspection it was found that it was a non labeled hazmat package. action taken was Admin put gloves on and processed the DPR. DescribePack: Bottle was crushed on top causing leakage from cap DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: package was damaged in damage area then moved to qa cage and kept there for the hazmat form.
